service_emails_template.subject: Urgent: Critical Service Disruption Affecting Proximus Consumer Market
service_emails_template.body:
Dear Marketing Specialist,

I am writing to you today with an urgent matter regarding a critical service disruption impacting Proximus' Consumer Market. Our Microsoft service, [Specific Service Name, e.g., 'Azure-powered customer portal'], is currently experiencing [Specific Issue, e.g., 'intermittent outages and slow loading times']. This is directly affecting Proximus' ability to [Specific Impact, e.g., 'provide a seamless online experience for their customers and manage their subscriptions effectively'].

The impact of this issue is significant. Proximus customers are experiencing [Specific Customer Impact, e.g., 'frustration, difficulty accessing their accounts, and potential loss of trust in the service']. This directly translates to [Specific Business Impact, e.g., 'a negative impact on customer satisfaction scores, potential churn, and a decrease in online transactions'].

We understand the importance of a reliable service for Proximus and their customers. Therefore, we need to address this issue immediately. We are currently working to identify the root cause and implement a solution. However, we need your support in [Specific Request, e.g., 'communicating this issue to the relevant Proximus teams and ensuring they are aware of the severity of the situation'].

We will keep you updated on our progress. Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or require further information.

Sincerely,
[Your Name/Team Name]
Microsoft
